00046 /** 
00047  *  @defgroup ro_globals Global variables 
00048  *  @code #include <leds.h> @endcode
00049  * 
00050  *  @brief global Variables for passing information between ISR and normal Code
00051  *
00052  * 
00053  * This file contains variables for intercommunication of sofware-modules
00054  * especially between Interrupt-Service-Routines that read the external sensors
00055  * and the control alorithms.
00056  *   
00057  *  @author Rainer Ostendorf
00058  */
00059 
00060 /**@{*/
00061 
00062 #ifndef GLOBAL_H_
00063 #define GLOBAL_H_
00064 
00065 #include <inttypes.h>
00066 
00067 /* Defines */
00068 
00069 /** Size of the samples ringbuffer for Gyro1.
00070  * The size is binary ANDed with the ringbuffer-index as
00071  * a real modulo would be much to expensive. So only values
00072  * the are 2 to the power of n with n = 0, 1, 2, .. are allowed here
00073  * e.g.: 1,2,4,16,32,64, 128, 255  using other value will lead
00074  * to unpredictable results, as the index will not increment linear 
00075  * Please be aware that a 8bit variable is used to hold this value,
00076  * so the maximum size is 255 ! */
00077  #define GYRO1_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE 8
00078  
00079  /** Size of the samples ringbuffer for gyro2 .
00080   * Same restrictions as for Gyro1_Bufsize -> el. of n = 2^x !*/
00081 #define GYRO2_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE 8 
00082 
00083 /** Size of the samples ringbuffer for accelerometer.  
00084   * Same restrictions as for Gyro1_Bufsize -> el. of n = 2^x !*/
00085 #define ACCL_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE 8
00086 
00087 /* ******** GYROSCOPES VALUES ************** */
00088 
00089 /** Index variables, holding the latest write positions of the ISR. */
00090 /* The lastes values is at sample[ (index-1)%BUFSIZE ], the ISR updates index  
00091  * after each write to buffer */
00092 uint8_t gyro1_idx;
00093 uint8_t gyro2_idx;
00094 /** Ringbuffers, the ISR saves the newest samples to */
00095 uint16_t gyro1_samples[ GYRO1_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE ];
00096 uint16_t gyro2_samples[ GYRO1_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE ];
00097 /** Current temperature value of the Gyros */
00098 uint16_t gyro1_temp;
00099 uint16_t gyro2_temp;
00100 
00101 /** Flag to trigger the finite state maschine within the
00102  * SPI-ISR to read the temperature of each sensor once
00103  * when set to 1. After the temp.-values are saved to their
00104  * global accessible variables, the flag is cleared.
00105  */
00106  uint8_t read_gyro_temp;
00107 
00108 /* ******** Accelerometer VALUES ************** */
00109 
00110 /** Index to accelerometer-samples ringbuffer */
00111 uint8_t accl_high_idx;
00112 uint8_t accl_low_idx;
00113 /** Ringbuffer holding last value of accelerometer */
00114 uint16_t accl_high_samples[ ACCL_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE ];
00115 uint16_t accl_low_samples[ ACCL_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE ];
00116 
00117 
00118 
00119 #endif /*GLOBAL_H_*/
00120 
00121 /*@}*/
00122
